crimes, victims of domestic violence and child victims. In support of Victim

court support program and parallel supports for victims where offenders are
involved in restorative justice.

increasing numbers of refugee claimants.

investments in techno�logy that will streamline processes and drive out
unnecessary costs. The department has received approval for 20 projects to date

conferencing, closed-circuit television enhancements and electronic online
application and registration solutions.

issues for Windows 10 remediation and court transcription services. Budget 2019

7 operating system as of January 2020, and will not release any security

produce unofficial transcripts quickly and efficiently. Currently, court
transcripts are prepared by contract transcribers upon request, regardless of
whether they are legally required or for informational purposes only
